abstractive.text: For the conceptual design, the marketing expert talked about the public's preference for looks over technological innovation; however, they both seem to be more important than ease of use.

extractive.speaker: D
extractive.text: Ease of use is important ,
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: D
extractive.text: but uh innovation is more important ,
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: D
extractive.text: and a fancy look and feel is uh even more important .
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: The current fashion among younger people favours bright colours and fruit and vegetable themes and spongy materials: pertinent exchangeable fronts can express such trends on the remote, and could also provide themes for other target groups.

extractive.speaker: D
extractive.text: And uh some fashion watchers have found out that the young target group likes fruit and vegetables in their uh clothes , shoes and furniture ,
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: D
extractive.text: and that they want spongy material .
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: D
extractive.text: or uh like cell phones , exch exchangeable covers .
extractive.label: sug

extractive.text: You could make a few v very colourful ones , and uh a very traditional co cover .
extractive.label: sug

extractive.text: maybe it rubber
extractive.label: sug

extractive.speaker: A
extractive.text: And what I'm thinking about , maybe um we should make very light but um uh a grip
extractive.label: sug

abstractive.text: Cases can be flat, single- or double-curved.

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: We have the uncurved or flat case . Uh that's the most common uh remote con control form uh

extractive.label: inf

extractive.text: which is curved in three dimension .
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: They can be made of plastic, rubber, wood or titanium.

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: We can use wood and titanium .
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: uh which is the same for rubber ,
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: Hand or kinetic dynamos, batteries, and solar cells can be used as energy sources.

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: we even seem to have uh hand dyn dynamos for uh powering our uh <vocalsound> remote controls .
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: Uh there's there's also a kinetic energy supply .
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: And we of course have the traditional uh solar power ,
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: Possible interfaces are push buttons, scroll wheels, and LCDs. A way to make this device different would be to use a scroll-wheel on the side with integrated button for volume control and mute.

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: um of course we have the push-buttons
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: and uh we also have scroll-wheels .
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: Um <vocalsound> uh in the indicators we have the L_C_D_ displays ,
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: A
extractive.text: this is my volume button . And I can either on this side or this side um <disfmarker>
extractive.label: sug

extractive.speaker: A
extractive.text: And click it to muten the device .
extractive.label: sug

abstractive.text: Speech recognition can be implemented by adding a sample sensor and speaker on the remote.

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: And there is something like a sample sensor and sample speaker ,
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: The final decisions also included combined battery with solar cells.

extractive.speaker: A
extractive.text: Traditional batteries uh and solar .
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: The team will design a single-curved device with a scroll wheel and speech recognition, in black and yellow, the company colours.

abstractive.text: They will also try to find a way to promote the corporate identity in the design of the look and feel and interface.

abstractive.text: It is not clear whether a kinetic dynamo can be used, because it is unlikely that a user shakes the remote enough, as one would do with similarly powered watches.

extractive.speaker: B
extractive.text: But if you're watching a movie , how many times uh you take the the remote control and and <disfmarker>
extractive.label: el.inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: But uh the problem here is that it it supplies a a very little amount of kinetic energy .
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: The use of a scroll wheel with integrated button was debated, as not everyone was convinced of its use for this project.

extractive.speaker: B
extractive.text: I can't see uh any uh scenario where you would use a scroll-wheel with a button on it .
extractive.label: inf

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: There's no scenario where you use uh the button in the scroll-wheel .
extractive.label: inf

abstractive.text: Using the speech recognition on the device may not be convenient, since the remote will have to pointing towards the TV at the same time for the infrared to work.

extractive.speaker: A
extractive.text: what about um <vocalsound> the issue I um addressed at the beginning of the meeting ? Um the voice function w with the infrared uh issue .
extractive.label: el.ass

extractive.speaker: C
extractive.text: It's it's <disfmarker> uh I uh I can imagine it's very dull to talk to a device w if you have to point to another device .

abstractive.text: LCD screens may add an extra hi-tech touch, but given all the other features, it might be too much.

extractive.text: according to Ruud , the the the market likes um new flashy technology ,
